definition: tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: Based on the six-freedom-degree ballistic equations, the model of air to ground submunition in the terminal guidance stage was established.
sentences.chinese: 利用六自由度动力学模型对末段弹道进行了仿真。

sentences.english: I am sure there will be all kinds of possibilities turning over in his head as we draw towards the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 我确信在赛季末段打德比战他已经想好了一切可能。

sentences.english: The long-distance pipeline end segment storing gas system was researched in this paper as a main enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究长输管线末段管道储存天然气系统。

definition: half of a game or contest/half-court
to reverse (the score)/to pull off a comeback/to take the lead
to hit the target with one's throw/(basketball) to score
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed
